title: Welcome to MPL Community!
message: We're excited to have you join our community platform. Explore all the features and connect with fellow gamers. Don't forget to check out our latest tournaments and rewards!

title: New App Update Available
message: We've just released version 5.2.0 of the MPL app with improved performance, bug fixes, and exciting new features. Update now to enjoy a smoother gaming experience!

title: Introducing: Ludo Supreme
message: Get ready for our newest game - Ludo Supreme! Challenge your friends, compete in tournaments, and win big rewards. The game launches tomorrow with special launch bonuses for early players.

title: Enhanced Wallet Security
message: We've upgraded our wallet security with two-factor authentication. Enable it now in your profile settings to keep your winnings safe and secure.

title: Weekend Tournament Alert
message: Don't miss our mega weekend tournament with a prize pool of ₹10,00,000! Registration is open now and closes in 24 hours. Limited slots available!

title: Refer & Earn Program Updated
message: We've improved our referral program! Now earn ₹100 for each friend who joins and plays their first game. Plus, your friends get a welcome bonus too!

title: New Payment Options Added
message: We've added UPI, net banking, and more wallet options for smoother transactions. Enjoy faster deposits and withdrawals with your preferred payment method.

title: Fantasy Cricket Season Starts
message: The cricket season is here! Create your dream team and compete in daily contests. New user? Get 100% bonus on your first deposit!
